metadata.name: Being Human 7227
metadata.description: Florencia S.M. Brück is an artist that uses various painting tools like AI, VR sculpting, 3D painting, photographic programs and modeling tools, as well as 2D digital painting techniques. Through mixing traditional artworks and these new technologies I’m looking to develop new creative processes that bring new meaning into our contemporary context. Her NFT Collection entitled "Being Human" focuses on the expression of aesthetics in a futuristic setting, using generative adversarial networks style language that is inspired by the painterly art of the Renaissance and Baroque tradition. She creates surreal, dreamlike imagery with a cyborg narrative. The artworks also exist in real life as a canvas where the artists intervenes the images with golden metallic inks and cyborg adornments.
